content: Tran lost the argument by making a logical fallacy known as a false equivalence. Matt was not equating being a woman with being a cat, but rather pointing out that Tran's argument was flawed because it implied that only members of a particular group have the right to define or discuss that group. Matt's question about cats was a way of illustrating the flaw in Tran's reasoning. By responding with sarcasm and avoiding the issue at hand, Tran failed to address Matt's point and further weakened their argument.
